channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Access Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Access Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-10262|2024-10-04T16:38:57.881Z -- oracle%20corporation -- access%20manager
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Access Manager component of Oracle Fusion Middleware (subcomponent: Web Server Plugin). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.3.0. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTPS to compromise Oracle Access Manager. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Access Manager accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.9 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2017-10154|2024-10-04T16:59:00.674Z -- oracle%20corporation -- access%20manager
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Access Manager component of Oracle Fusion Middleware (subcomponent: Web Server Plugin). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.3.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Access Manager. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Access Manager accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
